title: Multiple Tenants Issue
body:
Thank you for your great project at first.
I have a SPA with Zero, multiple tenants is enabled, when I login to host and a tenant with same one IE 11 browser, the application works as host always.
Any action in tenant application works as host, there is no tenant id in the audit log records.
After I logout from host, then the tenant works well, the tenant id is recorded in log table.
What's wrong?
Thank you.
author: fiting

comments.body: You can not login twice in same browser. Login as host in one browser and login as tenant in a different browser window (not tab) since same browser tabs share same cookies and login info is stored in cookies.

Thank you. But it works using Chrome, same browser different tab.


---

Thank you

satisfaction_conditions: Explanation of browser-specific cookie/session handling differences between IE 11 and Chrome
Identification of IE 11's limitations in session isolation between tabs/windows

_classification.category: Requires build environment but hard to be dockerized
